descriptions.description: Horseshoe Point Mediterranean Villa. Set within large 2,400+ sq.m landscaped gardens, this 3-bedroom Spanish style Villa looks amazing. Right at the front of the property is a freeform private swimming pool, and a large, covered poolside deck terrace and bar, where you can sit and relax in private, or entertain friends and family with cocktails, sangria, and a BBQ sizzling! Within the very large grounds is a 2-car garage, with electric shutters, guest studio accommodation, with their own kitchen and bathroom, plus an enclosed Pagoda which has a variety of purposes. As you step inside this 350 sq.m home, your eyes are immediately drawn upwards to the 6-metre-high ceilings, with exposed beams. As well as being a dramatic feature of the home it serves the purpose of keeping the whole property cool. And it really does. Walk barefoot on the terracotta tiling and your feet will remain cool throughout the house. There is a spacious Western kitchen that is open to the dining area, and the addition of a pantry, or laundry room beside really is convenient. There is also another separate storage room within the house, which really helps keep the home clutter free. The master bedroom has access out onto the poolside terrace, perfect for that morning swim. It also features a walk-in wardrobe and an en-suite bathroom with ‘his & hers’ hand basins and a Jacuzzi bathtub. Each of the other 2 bedrooms also have access out onto the terrace. Overall, the house, and space around the property is very impressive, and with a few little touches here and there, would be totally transformed into a real ‘showstopper’!

descriptions.description: This large plot is on 2 title deeds, and crosses a natural stream. The land is cleared completely but will need some land fill in preparation for development. This plot can be ready for housing development, or for industrial usage. Access to the plot can be directly from the Bangkok - Pattaya Motorway (7) so it's very convenient to access Pattaya City, and all the International Schools in the area. Mabprachan Lake is just 10 minutes from here.

descriptions.description: Pattaya Height Condominium. Positioned just 50 metres from Jomtien Beach, this makes it an ideal location for many. From here you can enjoy a stroll along the shaded pathways, or chill and take a rest in a wide selection of cafés, restaurants and bars. Public transport also passes by here, so you can ‘hop on’ to go further south along the beach, or travel in the opposite direction and arrive in Downtown Pattaya within 10 minutes. The building is very presentable, and has an elevated communal swimming pool, onsite restaurant and excellent security

descriptions.description: The Residence Jomtien Beach. Just five minutes from Jomtien’s beaches yet hidden away in a nice quiet area. This is a cozy and private, small low-rise building with only 68 units. The swimming pool is a main feature as it is both large and unique. At the far end of the pool is a fully equipped poolside gymnasium. This is a great corner unit, west facing, on the 3rd floor of the building overlooking the whole pool. It is very rare to find such a generous (85sq.m) one bedroom unit these days, as properties continue to get smaller and smaller! With the large proportions, is easily fits the big leather sofa, 65″ wall mounted flat screen TV and built in entertainment unit, comfortable king size bed and enough storage space for a couple to live comfortably. The bathroom is spacious with a walk in shower with glass partition and hand basin with under storage and full size vanity mirror Now we talk about the oversized ‘double balcony’. It boasts enough room to eat dinner on, and in the evenings the whole pool area is illuminated with LED lighting and is such a terrific place to be. Viewing over the gardens and pool make this place feel like a tropical resort. Owned in Company Name. All taxes and transfers shall be split 50/50 between buyer and seller. These new homes are a modern contemporary design with a 2 storey layout. Each property sits within their own private gardens, and each enjoys a nice private swimming pool and large outdoor terrace. The construction will be of top quality, with the use of high-end materials to finish each home. All common utilities will be underground, have wide access roads and the entrance will be secured by modern access systems. There are 26 houses in total: 14 x 3 bedroom + 4 bathroom. descriptions.description: Nam Talay Condominium. From this 12th floor corner unit, every room enjoys fabulous sea, sunset, mountain and city views. This impressive 51sq.m corner unit is set within a complex completed in 2017. The condo is located at the Southern end of Jomtien Beach, in an area called Na Jomtien. The building is just 200 metres from the beach, and is a nice short walk. The current owner completely renovated the whole unit to include: a built in dishwasher under the counter top of the European fitted kitchen, a built in washing machine below the bathroom counter tops, a huge 60” TV in the living room, a telescopic television you can watch in bed and also on the balcony, new LED lights throughout, and a keyless digital front door. Nam Talay condo has some great facilities to enjoy. A massive communal swimming pool dominates the central area, with mature trees and grass. On the rooftop, this space has been decked with artificial grass, and has lots of seating so everybody can enjoy the amazing views and sea breeze. Na Jomtien is a quieter part of Jomtien Beach, yet has sufficient shops, restaurants and beach bars. A taxi can get you to the busier bar areas within 5 minutes, plus there are water parks, golf courses and other attractions just 20 minutes away. The property is owned in Company Name, which means that the new buyer will take over the company directorship shares at a very minimal cost. Contact Cornerstone Real Estate on +6638411250 or send us an Email at info@cornerstone.co.th for more details or to arrange a viewing

With pleasant, but diligent security guards at the entrance, to the wide landscaped roads throughout the village, the place feels homely and safe. There is a nice common area in the central of the village which has a generous grassed playpark, a long communal swimming pool, poolside gymnasium and even a friendly bar and seating area to entertain family and friends. This 3-bedroom single storey home boasts its own private swimming pool which sets it apart from many other homes in the village. The whole house has been maintained to a very high level always, and has just received a fresh make-over so it is in perfect condition. There is a main living area with a smaller conservatory beside. descriptions.description: Just a few minutes from the entrance to Phoenix Gold Golf Course you will find this quiet and private villa, set off of a newly surfaced wide main road. With a generous 300 Wah² (1,200 sq.m) of land the house is very private and has large landscaped gardens and a private pool at the rear of the house. The home has been very well maintained, and regularly repainted. With the house set back from the entrance, it reveals itself behind small flower beds. There is plenty of car parking available. There are a couple of ways to enter the house – through the covered archways into the living room, or around the side of the house to enter directly into the kitchen (perfect for when you’ve been grocery shopping). Overall the house has 3 bedrooms, and 3 bathrooms. The master bedroom has its own en-suite bathroom, a walk through wardrobe and access out into the gardens and pool. Beyond the living room is a lovely dining room, and fully equipped Western kitchen. At the rear of the house is a shaded seating area beside the private swimming pool. The home has free water supplied into the house via a 75m deep bore hole, and the garden is watered from another shallower water well.

. All of the homes in this particular village are large properties, occupied by professional Ex-Pats who need to be close to the Eastern Seaboard and the International schools for the children. Inside, the home has been extremely well furnished, and compliments the outstanding fitted Euro kitchen and other built in furniture throughout the house. This is a perfect long-term rental property and “it can be yours” with a 12-month rental contract and a 2-month security deposit. It is also for sale with the title deed currently held in Thai Name. All property taxes and transfer fees shall be split equally 50/50 between buyer and seller Call to arrange a viewing. +6638411250 or Email info@cornerstone.co.th

Citismart Condo is a low rise condominum located in Soi 1, right in the heart of Pattaya City. This 2 bedroom unit available for rent long term. It comes fully furnished. Within a 2 minute walk to the famous Pattaya Beach, local taxis, shopping centers / Malls and all the things for your entertainment that Pattaya has to offer. The unit has been furnished to a modern standard and each room having a flat screen tv and hot water, European kitchen, air conditioning throughout and city views from the balcony. Facilities onsite include 24 hour security, Covered Parking Key card access, Roof top swimming pool. Offered for rent on long term basis only. For more information, please contact Cornerstone Real Estate on 038411250 or info@cornerstone.co.th

549 wah² land plot for sale. The size is equal to 2,196 square metres and is located along a wide cemented road close to the Mabprachan Lake/Reservoir. The lands plot is cleared and it benefits from being on a naturally sloping area, so has excellent water run-off. As all the land drops away there are also nice views of the neighbouring hillside and Buddha statue. The price is calculated at 11,500 Baht per wah² which offers excellent value for a roadside plot, cleared with natural drainage. Another possibility could be to cut the land plot into 2, or 3 smaller plots for re-sale or to develop into a small cluster of houses. Various International schools and a university are in close proximity, and just a few minutes away is the Siam Country Club Golf Course with 4 International courses! Government electricity and water connections are simply and there is already high speed fiber optic in the area. Owned in Company Name the property can be transferred with minimum expense. Available for viewing now. Call our Cornerstone Real Estate office +6638411250 or Email info@cornerstone.co.th to make an appointment

Espana Condominium. Located at the Southern end of Jomtien this resort style project offers residents an easy access to Na Jomtien beach. The new Bangkok Pattaya motorway extension is just 2 kilometres away and there are also some amazing beachfront restaurants at hand. This 1-bedroom unit has views into the central courtyard and communal swimming pool. Fully decorated and fully furnished, this 35 square metre one-bedroom apartment is positioned on the 6th floor of the building. Inside, there is a very stylish design and fit out and comes fitted with a European kitchen, built in wardrobes, fitted furniture and modern bathroom. As well as the huge central swimming pool, the project provides: Gymnasium & Sauna, a children’s playground, an onsite restaurant and free Wi-Fi For further details, or to make an appointment call us on +6638411250 or Email info@old.cornerstone.co.th

The Cliff Condominium. This 27 storey condominium is located on Cozy Beach, Pratumnak Hill. This is a popular beach area that has a quiet bay with clean waters and views across to Koh Larn Island. Pratumnak Hill is central to both Jomtien and Downtown Pattaya, and is recognised as a far quieter residential part of the city. Cosy Beach has a small high street that runs through the area, and caters for all local residents. By day you can enjoy a choice of massage and spa’s, and in the evening there are a good selection of restaurants & bars to unwind. This 39 square metre studio apartment has a very practical layout and features a great use of space. It is positioned on the 19th floor of the tower with Pattaya City bay and sea-views. It is sold fully equipped with a Euro kitchen, built in furniture and fitted bathroom. The Cliff Condominium has a 30 metre communal swimming pool, a poolside gymnasium and a separate children’s pool and water slides. The condo is available to buy in Foreign Name (freehold) ownership with any property taxes and transfer fees split on a 50/50 basis. Call us on 038411250 or email info@old.cornerstone.co.th to make an appointment to view.

Peak Towers Condominium. Standing tall, close to Cozy Beach on Pratumnak Hill is this high-rise tower complex, built by Heights Holdings. The towers were completed in 2017, and are situated just 500 metres from a magnificent beach. In the immediate vicinity is the famous Sky Gallery &amp; Chocolate factory cliff-top restaurants, plus a small high street with plenty more restaurants, bars, shops, sauna/spa and a fresh market stall. This 2-bedroom unit is a combination of 2 x 43sq.m units, which work really well and creates an impressive 16<sup>th</sup> floor sea-view 86sq.m unit. The unit is being sold as “<em>brand new</em>” condition from the developer with built-in furniture, air conditioning in all rooms, a full European kitchen and dual sea-view balconies. Within the project, Peak Towers Condominium provides a really amazing infinity edge rooftop swimming pool where you can enjoy full 360° views over Cosy Beach, Jomtien Beach and Pattaya Bay. There is also a rooftop gymnasium here also with similar views. Inside the condo grounds is another swimming pool, with a children’s kid’s pool with a playground, tropical garden and water features. Sold in Foreign Name (freehold) quota, with the transfer fee costs split equally 50/50 with the developer. All of the taxes will be paid by the developer. Call us on 038411250 or email: info@cornerstone.co.th to make an appointment to view.

TW Platinum Suites. Consisting of 3 low-rise condominium buildings which wrap around a central communal swimming pool. This Condo is located on Thepprasit Road, and gives easy access to Jomtien beach and routes into Pattaya City. Also, within a couple of minutes is the Thepprasit weekend market, and the large Tesco Lotus & Outlet retail mall. This studio unit is a total of 51.12sqm which includes a large 4th floor pool view balcony. The unit was totally renovated in 2019 and looks really great!! There very nice bright pictures and furniture to make the property feel homely. A Western kitchen is at one end, and the bathroom has also been renovated with new bathroom furniture and a washing machine. Facilities of the building include: swimming pool and fitness, 24-hour security, covered parking. Available for sale in Foreign (freehold) Name. Call Cornerstone Real Estate on +6638411250 or Email info@cornerstone.co.th or further details, or to make an appointment

D-Space Pattaya. D-Space Pattaya takes its inspiration from modern architecture. The 2 storey homes really stand out with their unique design. Influenced by using modern shapes with emphasis on maximizing space and connecting the interior to the green outdoor areas around the house. The main stand out feature of these houses is the six meters double height living room that creates a feeling of space and naturally cools the room. A brand-new village being constructed in Huay Yai, East Pattaya. They are building 16 high quality private homes that will be set within a secure landscaped environment. The developers have also put a priority to providing each home, and the whole village with energy efficient design features:Roof installation under the roof. For every house in the project, there is a heat, cold and anti-leak insulation system that offers excellent protection from heat coming in through the roof, and traps and retains all the cold air from your air conditioners inside the home.The house saves energy by using an environmentally-friendly innovation. It has a linear design positioned to receive wind from the northern and southern directions, so the house is cool year-round.Using natural light from the installation of skylights will let in ‘indirect’ sunlight which will illuminate the interior to be brighter so that there is no need to turn any lights on during the daytime.All light bulbs in the house are LED that dramatically reduces monthly electricity cost.Throughout the village are Eco SMART solar cell street lights which cut costs for common fees shared by each owner. They are bright, attractive, inexpensive and turn on and off automatically without wires or electricity costs. As well as a very unique & luxurious living room, these 2 storey houses provide owners with 3 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, a fitted Western kitchen ‘plus’ an outdoor Thai kitchen and a private swimming pool (2.5m x 6m) in the landscaped garden. The master bedroom boasts a walk-in closet and en-suite bathroom. There is a SMART Home system, fitted as standard in all houses. This technology can be controlled by your tablet, or smart phone and is used to control many things inside the house. For example, you can set the light to automatically turn on and off when you enter/exit the house, set a timer for the air conditioner, or view the CCTV security footage inside the house, even when you are not in the house. On the front door is a digital door lock with passcode or thumb-print access. At the front of the property is a car-port large enough for 2 vehicles, which is secured by a Häfele electric roller shutter. Within this area is also aa built in storage area that offers a convenient place to store all DIY items, or for sports gear and equipment. TYPE A Villa: 57.44wah² – 61.43wah² – Prices starting from 6,900,000 THBTYPE B Villa: 58.68wah² – 69.46wah² – Prices starting from 7,250,000 THB Send us an Email or contact the office for more details, or to arrange a viewing – Tel: +6638411250 or Email: info@cornerstone.co.th Map

Silk Road. This village is highly sought after, and when you drive in through the village you can immediately see that this is a high end secure village where everything is highly maintained. There are amazing communal facilities including pool, tennis court, gymnasium and children's play-park. The 4 bedroom home has been very well maintained throughout, and really is a stunning property, inside and out. The front of the house has impressive landscaped gardening, and this continues to the rear of the property where you will also find the private swimming pool and outdoor terrace. Located just 5 minutes across the Sukhumvit Road in the East Jomtien area of the city, you have access to a large Tesco superstore and a small high street of shops and market, plus along the Sukhumvit road is the huge Makro superstore, Big C Super-center and the Tesco Lotus hypermarket and outlet shopping mall Call \Cornerstone Real Estate\ on \+6638411250\ or Email \\info@cornerstone.co.th\\ for further details, or to make an appointment \ \

The developers have also put a priority to providing each home, and the whole village with energy efficient design features:Roof installation under the roof. For every house in the project, there is a heat, cold and anti-leak insulation system that offers excellent protection from heat coming in through the roof, and traps and retains all the cold air from your air conditioners inside the home.The house saves energy by using an environmentally-friendly innovation. It has a linear design positioned to receive wind from the northern and southern directions, so the house is cool year-round.Using natural light from the installation of skylights will let in ‘indirect’ sunlight which will illuminate the interior to be brighter so that there is no need to turn any lights on during the daytime.All light bulbs in the house are LED that dramatically reduces monthly electricity cost.Throughout the village are Eco SMART solar cell street lights which cut costs for common fees shared by each owner. 21st floor, 1-bedroom unit for sale or rent, at The Cliff in the Cozy Beach area of Pratumnak has a 47 sqm living area and has been furnished to a nice standard. The Cliff Condominium is a popular choice because of the favored location, which is close to multiple beaches, restaurants, bars, downtown Pattaya and Jomtien within 10 minutes. The building has onsite 24-hour patrolling security guards, CCTV, Juristic office, communal swimming pool, fitness center, children’s area and underground parking. It is available to rent with a minimum 12 months contract for 16,000 Baht. Contact us here at Cornerstone Real Estate for more information, we will more than happy to help. Telephone: 038 411250 Email: info@cornerstone.co.th

Hyde Park 2 Condo. This is a stunning example of a perfectly maintained 1-bedroom property, which offers all modern touches, and nice scenery of the city from the 4th floor wrap-around balcony. All areas of the condo have been constantly re-decorated and upgraded through the years, and the whole space feels light and welcoming. Located in South Pattaya, it is just a short walk from Walking Street & Bali Hai pier, or hop onto the regular taxi’s and be in the centre of town in 5 minutes. The condo is finished with LED TV’s, a modern Euro kitchen with under-lit LED lighting, and a quality bathroom. Hyde Park 2 Condo facilities include a rooftop swimming pool, gymnasium & sauna. There is also undercover parking, 24-hour security and an on-site maintenance team. Book a viewing for this amazing home by contacting the Cornerstone Real Estate office. Tel: +6638411250. Alternatively send an Email to info@old.cornerstone.co.th for further details and to reserve an appointment.

City Garden Pattaya. Possibly one of the most popular buildings in the city centre. It is located just off from Pattaya 2nd road, and its close to both South Pattaya, and Soi Buakow. Just 200 metres away are both The Avenue Shopping Mall, and Royal Garden Plaza, plus the more famous beachfront shopping mall “Central Festival Pattaya Beach” is just a 5-minute walk away. For anyone who enjoys dining out, or loves to party the night away, you will find some of the best International cuisine, and nigh spots are right on your doorstep! This particular unit is a total of 59 square metres, and combines a generous living room, open plan kitchen, balcony, bathroom and en-suite bathroom. City Garden Pattaya Condo provide fantastic communal facilities, which include a central communal swimming pool that is bordered by a poolside gymnasium, sauna and steam room, plus a poolside coffee shop & bistro. There are laundry facilities and site as well as an experienced maintenance and reception team. Contact Cornerstone Real Estate to check the availability of this property. Email: info@old.cornerstone.co.th or our office +6638411250

Nova Atrium, located in Central Pattaya, meaning that everything that you will need is minutes away from shopping malls, some exquisite fine dining, supermarkets and only 5 minutes to the beach This 2nd floor 76 sqm, 1 bedroom, 2-bathroom unit, comes fully furnished to a high standard with Chesterfield sofas, European Kitchen, tv and air-conditioning throughout. The Nova Atrium consists of 7 storeys and has 76 stunningly units. Onsite there is a large communal pool, covered parking, 24hr security and gymnasium. Available for long term rent 6 months and above 12,000 Baht. For more information, please contact Cornerstone Real Estate on 038 411250 or email on info@cornnerstone.co.th

Permsub Garden Resort. A practical 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom single storey bungalow which is located in a very secure East Pattaya family village. There are huge communal garden spaces which are large enough for all the kids in the village to play in safety, plus the communal swimming pool is here too. There is also ‘The Elite Academy Private School’ and a martial arts school within the grounds. This lovely 2-bedroom property has been very well maintained and it does feel very homely indeed. The living room is well decorated with designer wallpaper, sculpted ceilings and a smart LED TV. There is a great Western kitchen with central island counter top at the far end of the house. Each bedroom is either side of the living room so give good privacy, and both have immediate access to bathrooms. The front gardens have been landscaped and there is room for off road covered car-parking. Permsub Garden Resort is close to Soi Siam Country Club in East Pattaya. There are many shops, markets bars & restaurants locally, and it is also very convenient for many of the International schools in the area. Connections onto the highway routes to access the Eastern Seaboard (Rayong, Laem Chabang and Chonburi) are close by. All rental contracts much be a minimum of 12 months and provide a 2-month security deposit. Call us on +6638411250 or Email info@cornerstone.co.th to make an appointment

City Garden Pattaya. A great 1 bedroom “pool view” unit in a fantastic city centre condominium complex. City Garden Pattaya provide a very clean environment, with underground car parking below each building keeping the central area clear of cars and motorbikes. The communal facilities include a nice swimming pool with plenty of space around the pool to sit and sunbathe, a pool view fitness center, sauna, steam room and changing rooms. Right beside the pool is a poolside coffee shop and restaurant, and there is also on-site laundry too. Overall the living space is 50 sq.m which includes the balcony. It offers a well-proportioned living room, with open plan fitted kitchen, a generous bathroom with rain shower and bedroom with corner windows. Directly outside the complex is a 7/11 convenience store, and only 100 metres away is The Avenue shopping Mall and Pattaya 2nd road. Pattaya Beach, Walking Street and Soi Buakow are just 5 minutes away It is offered for long term (12 month) rent in a fully furnished condition, and it requires a 2month security deposit. Contact Cornerstone Real Estate to check the availability of this property. Email: info@cornerstone.co.th or our office +6638411250

The Axis Condominium. Set right on the top of Pratumnak/Thappraya Hill, this high rise tower has a really accessible location for Pattaya City, Jomtien and Pratumnak Beaches. There are many shops and restaurants along the main road outside too. The Axis Condominium offers multi storey car and motorbike parking for the whole project as well as an elevated sea-view communal swimming pool and gymnasium. This particular unit is located on the 5th floor, and offers a total of 56 sq.m living space (including balcony). The smart design creates a spacious 2 bedroom property which is very homely. There is a fully equipped western kitchen with built in washing machine that wraps 2 sides of the open plan living area. From the balcony you have complete privacy overlooking the gardens and community play-park that is part of the Buddha hilltop. The master bedroom is very big and incorporates a unique open en-suite bathroom. The guest bedroom is opposite the guest bathroom. All rooms are fully furnished and air conditioned. It is available to buy in Foreign Name (freehold) ownership with any property taxes and transfer fees split on a 50/50 basis. Call us on 038411250 or email info@cornerstone.co.th to make an appointment to view.

Centara Avenue Residence. This location could not be more perfect for anyone wishing to be central to everything that Pattaya City has to offer. Pattaya Beach is just 500 metres away, and there is a choice of 3 leading Shopping Malls all within 5 minutes walk (one of them is literally next door to this project). All of the entertainment zones in Walking Street and Soi Buakow are also just a few minutes walk! Centara Avenue Residence has been designed with all condo buildings wrapping around a central communal swimming pool, which has 2 water-slides and a sunken bar. As part of the project there is Centara Azure Hotel which can provide room service, and snack food around the pool. Inside the hotel is an amazing, modern style restaurant serving Western food and some fine ding dishes! This 47 square metre One Bedroom unit has ample space in the living area for full furniture, an equipped Western kitchen with built in fridge freezer & oven. The bedroom is also well proportioned and features fitted wardrobes and an adjoining en-suite bathroom. Both the living room and bedroom have access to the pool view balcony. Owned in Foreign Name (freehold) ownership with all taxes & transfer fees split 50/50 with the new buyer. Book a viewing for this superb pool view condo by contacting the Cornerstone Real Estate office. Tel: +6638411250. Alternatively send an Email to info@cornerstone.co.th for further details and to reserve an appointment.

Club Royal Wongamat. This beachside resort complex is located in Naklua, Wongamat Beach. It is just 50 metres from an amazing quiet beach, and also gives all co-owners full access to a huge lagoon swimming pool, sea view rooftop gymnasium, and underground car parking. The design provides a 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom layout which includes a fitted Euro kitchen, full furniture & air conditioning in all rooms. As well as the location being fantastic for 'beach lovers', it is also just 10 minutes from Downtown Pattaya and Terminal 21 shopping mall. This property title deed is in Foreign Name (freehold) ownership, and it has been reduced in price for a quick sale, and is now below the original contracted price. Send us an Email or contact the office for more details, or to arrange a viewing - Tel: +6638411250 or Email: info@cornerstone.co.th

Grand Avenue Condominium is situated on just under 11 rai of prime city-centre land behind Avenue Shopping Mall on Soi 15, the project is just minutes away from Pattaya’s numerous bars, restaurants, shopping centres and beaches. The 788 unit condominium will occupy over 12,000 SQM of land and will house 6 individual buildings in a courtyard set up with one huge communal swimming pool, Jacuzzis, waterfalls, mini water park with slides and chill out zones. Pool bars and ponds will complete the area. Parking is underground and monitored by patrolling security and CCTV. This 46sqm, 2nd floor unit comes fully furnished with European Kitchen, all brand-new electronics and furniture, with city views. Grand Avenue Pattaya construction was completed in 2019. Grand Avenue Pattaya has 8 floors and contains 788 total units, Units range from studio to 2 bedroom. Grand Avenue Pattaya at Central Pattaya, Pattaya has the following facilities: cctv, fitness, garden, library, parking, playground, security and swimming pool. The unit is available for sale and is owned in company name, so very easy and costs effective to purchase. Contact Cornerstone Real Estate team for more information or help on email at info@cornerstone.co.th or call us on 038 411250

Wongamat Garden Beach Resort Condominium. This high-rise development located directly on the Wongamat beach exudes class and luxury. Within a 2-minute walk you have the famous Sanctuary of Truth, which is popular postcode in Pattaya. Wongamat Beach, being on the best beaches out of all of your local beachside destinations. this beautiful location has stunning views. With the large balcony offer stunning sea and island views, and with the light and bright spacious environment, this unit really stands out from the rest, and should be on anyone’s viewing list! This is 50 sqm condominium, located on the 27th floor. The unit is offered for long term rental and comes fully furnished, plus it includes a fully fitted European kitchen, flat screen TV and air conditioning. The balcony offers phenomenal sea views. This unit really must be seen to be appreciated! Onsite facilities include: 24 Hours Security Communal Swimming Pool Covered Car Parking Gymnasium Sauna Offering very easy access into downtown Pattaya, although the whole stretch of Wongamat beach is now fully developed and offers 5 star hotels, High end branded beachfront restaurants, shopping, and plenty of nightlife. It has also become a popular location for professional Foreign Ex-Pats needing easy commuting to the various industrial areas, or to the capital – Bangkok. Available for long term rental for 19,500 Baht, based on a 1 year contract. Contact Cornerstone Real Estate team for more information or help on email at info@cornerstone.co.th or call us on 038 411250

Silverlake Home. This high quality 4 bedroom home offers a very unique outlook with views over a private lake from the rear gardens and swimming pool. Located very close to the scenic Khao Chee Chan (Buddha Mountain), Silverlake Vineyards and the brand new International standard 'Chee Chan' golf course, which are all around 20 minutes from Downtown Pattaya. This area has become a quiet residential area for people who do not require access to the busy Pattaya City every day anyway.. Residents here have opted to live and enjoy the quieter surrounding with lots of nature. This does not compromise convenience however, as there are large supermarkets, home & furniture stores and the beautiful Bang Saray shoreline just 5-10 minutes away. In overall design, this 250 sqm property is 4 bedroom, with 4 bathroom which has an additional full maids/guest house with its own living room, bedroom and bathroom. Being designed and built by an experienced UK builder, this house has Thermo Block external & internal walls, a nice European kitchen with breakfast counter and built-in appliances, a laundry room, central hot water system, water filtration and a private water well. The downstairs space is for use in the day. A wide living room opens up completely into the gardens and covered private pool area. Just over the rear wall is a large private lake and some small holiday dwellings. Upstairs are all 4 bedrooms. 3 of these have their own attached en-suite bathrooms, and the master bedroom has an upper balcony with views over the lake! Owned and sold in Company Name, all transfer costs should be relatively low cost. Send us an Email or contact the office for more details, or to arrange a viewing - Tel: +6638411250 or Email: info@cornerstone.co.th

titles.title: Sunrise Villa Resort - Move in with 1,400,000 THB deposit

descriptions.description: Sunrise Villa Resort. ** The seller can offer "Owner Finance" with a 1,400,000 Thai Baht deposit ** This offer will be 0% interest with payment periods less than 2 years. Longer periods are available, however with a small interest payment. This small enclave of luxury villas is located in East Jomtien, beside the Phoenix Gold Golf and Country Club, close to Huay Yai. Freom this location there are many great attracions to see, beautiful beaches, and beachfront restaurants. At Sunrise Villa Resort there is a large swimming pool and Jacuzzzi at the centre of mature tropical gardens. Surrounding the pool are sun loungers, a BBQ area / Barbecue grill with seating/dining area and covered car parking. The 3 bedrooms house is set over 3 floor levels. The Ground Floor (73 sqm) holds a bedroom, a bathroom, a living room and dining-room with European kitchen and a Thai kitchen outside. The 2nd Floor (70 sqm) has a very big 25 sqm master bedroom with a balcony and a king size bed. Besides this the floor offers another large bedroom with a private balcony. Both balconies have great views over the pool and the tropical garden. Finally, a large bathroom and a hallway leading to the stairs to the ground floor and the 3rd floor. The 3rd Floor (40 sqm) has a large terrace, a Thai kitchen featuring a fantastic view over the garden, the pool, the mountains and Phoenix Golf Course. Owned, and sold in Company Name ownership. ** The seller can offer "Owner Finance" with a 1,400,000 Thai Baht deposit Call Cornerstone Real Estate on +6638411250 or Email info@cornerstone.co.th

The Sanctuary Wongamat. This is a luxury condominium complex which is located directly on one of the best private beaches in the whole of Pattaya. At the most northerly part of Wongamat Beach this position is quiet and peaceful, with only one more condo and a small beachfront hotel in the same area. Overall, this complex consists of 3 low-rise buildings, each with under cover car parking, and direct elevator access to each floor. All of the rooms were very generous in size, and this particular unit is a total of 100 sq.m. ** Owner financing is possible over 12 months with a 4m Baht down payment ** There is a large open plan living room, with a superb fitted European kitchen that has built in washing machine, oven and fridge freezer. Beyond, there is an oversized terrace, which, because it is on the ground floor gives immediate access to the reflection gardens and communal swimming pool. Both family size bedrooms have access to their own private en-suite bathrooms and the master bathroom boats a separate rain shower and bathtub. The owner has handpicked all of the furniture and decoration which all matches and makes the condo feel very homely. Another reason for The Sanctuary Wongamat being so popular with owners and tenants is that the whole project is spread out on a large plot which gives sufficient space for tennis courts, gymnasium & sauna, children’s playpark and an elevated walkway which leads directly onto the beach! Right next door is a Centara hotel so it is possible to dine in their beachfront café and restaurant. Close to this condo is Naklua and Wongamat. Both areas have additional shops, restaurants and markets, plus at the end of Naklua Road is the brand-new terminal 21 shopping mall. The property is owned in Foreign Name (freehold) ownership and the seller gives the opportunity to pay a 4m Baht down payment now, and the spread the balance over 12 months (1 year) Once paid, the land office tax and transfer fees will be split equally between buyer and seller Book a viewing for this unique condo opportunity by contacting the Cornerstone Real Estate office. Tel: +6638411250. Alternatively send an Email to info@cornerstone.co.th for further details and to reserve an appointment.

ESPANA CONDO RESORT PATTAYA is a condo project located on Jomtien 2nd road, a 3-minute walk to the famous Jomtien beach. There is every amenities close by from fresh markets, shops, restaurants and bars The units range from a studio to 2 bedrooms and the complex has 7 buildings and 1098 units in total and the development was finished in 2018. This 35 sqm, 1-bedroom unit, positioned on the 2nd floor comes fully furnished, with European Kitchen, dining area and from balcony you can see the main communal swimming pool. Facilities CCTV Fitness Garden Parking Security Swimming pool Pool table Sauna Dip pool Owned in Thai name, the owner will split all land office fees 50/50 with the buyer. Contact Cornerstone Real Estate team for more information or help. You can reach us on email at info@cornerstone.co.th or call us on 038 411250

ESPANA CONDO RESORT PATTAYA is a recently finished condo project (2018) located on Jomtien 2nd road, a 3-minute walk to the beach. Finished in a Mediterranean style, this project is unique and exudes class throughout. This 35 sqm, 1-bedroom unit, positioned on the 5th floor comes fully furnished, with European Kitchen, dining area and from balcony you can enjoy city views. Amenities CCTV Fitness Garden Parking Security Swimming pool Pool table Sauna Dip pool For sale at 2.5 Million Baht or for long term rental of 12,000 Baht Owned in Thai name, the owner will split all land office fees 50/50 with the buyer. Rose Land and House. A 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom single storey villa inside a secure East Pattaya village. The village is close to the access points of the Bangkok motorway and other major highway routes. This means that all of the International schools and the many logistic and manufacturing plants around the Eastern Seaboard are quick to get to. Inside the village is a large club house where there is a huge swimming pool, gymnasium and plenty of covered sundeck areas to enjoy throughout the day. All rooms of the property come fully furnished, and there is a useable Western kitchen and clean white bathrooms.
