There is a pool view balcony from the living room and both of the bedrooms. Each room has high ceilings, is fully furnished and fully air conditioned. Facilities at Royal Hill Condo include a massive central swimming pool, gym, under cover parking and 24-hr security. The property is owned in Foreign Name ownership, with all tax and transfer fees split equally 50/50 Send us an Email or contact the office for more details, or to arrange a viewing: Tel: +6638411250 or Email: info@cornerstone.co.th

The Orient. The design of this whole project is very classic white with “renaissance style” buildings that encircle a huge lagoon communal swimming pool with private grassed areas throughout, to sit in the shade and relax in luxury. Completed at the end of 2018 this condominium project is located halfway along Jomtien Beach and just 800 metres from it. Beside the buildings is a small high street of shops, local Thai restaurants and a fresh market. Along the beachfront are some splendid Western & Seafood restaurants, shops and a choice of sports pubs with live music, or beach bars. This city view 2 bedroom unit is set on the top floor (8th) and comes fully furnished, fully air conditioned plus has an L shape Western kitchen with fitted appliances. The design places each bedroom at opposing ends of the room so that the open plan living room is at the centre. This works well as it gives double side-by-side balconies from the living room and large windows in each bedroom to enjoy the views. The Orient provides a range of facilities and features, such as a fully equipped fitness room, large grand lobby’s with receptions and on-site staff, ample secure car parking, CCTV and 24-hour security guards. Available for rent on a long term 12-month basis with a 2 month security deposit. Send us an Email or contact the office for more details, or to arrange a viewing: Tel: +6638411250 or Email: info@cornerstone.co.th

Sansuk Town Home. This great family housing village is located close to Nern Plabwan in East Pattaya. Surrounding this area are plenty of local Thai and International schools, a choice of markets, stores and shops. A short drive can get you to Expat areas with a huge array of Western restaurants and bars, and getting into the city is also quick and easy. This 2 storey townhome has a spacious downstairs open living area with a small guest toilet and built in Euro kitchen to the rear. Upstairs are all 3 of the bedrooms and a further 2 bathrooms. The largest master bedroom has walk through wardrobes, a small outdoor balcony and an en-suite bathroom. The whole house has been furnished well and decorated brightly. To the front of the house is a space for off road parking and its large enough for a small seating area to drink and dine outdoors. Sansuk Town is a quiet village, has 24-hour security guards on the front gate and a communal swimming pool, with seating and BBQ area. Owned in Company Name which can make this purchase very cheap to transfer. Call Cornerstone Real Estate on +6638411250 or Email info@cornerstone.co.th

Wongamat Tower. A great high-rise tower that offers a direct beachfront position along one of the best beaches in Pattaya. Wongamat Beach is a smaller (more private) beachfront which has a decked pathway running along the whole length of shoreline. You will see people enjoying watersports, sunbathing and playing with family. Such a quiet area, removed from the hustle and bustle of the city….yet conveniently situated only minutes from downtown Pattaya. This superb 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom front corner unit occupies a total living area of 92.5 sqm and has full height floor to ceiling windows to enjoy the incredible panoramic views. The property is available fully-furnished and fully-equipped. It offers a direct entry into the property via the private elevator that opens directly into the living room. Both bedrooms are a generous size and each has full height fitted wardrobes and access to bright modern bathrooms. From this 9th floor apartment you can enjoy great sea views and breezes. Wongamat Tower has 2 swimming pools. The rooftop pool has an “infinity” pool which floats above the sea!! There is also a large sea view rooftop gymnasium, sauna, a ground floor pool and multi-storey car parking. For sale in Foreign name Ownership with an equal 50/50 split for taxes and transfer fees. Also it is available for rent on a long term 12 month basis with a 2 month security deposit. Call Cornerstone Real Estate on +6638411250 or Email info@cornerstone.co.th for further details, or to make an appointment

The Win Townhouse. Located just off of Soi Khao Talo in East Pattaya it is just a few hundred metres away from the busy Sukhumvit Road or the railway bypass and hundreds of local businesses. You can also choose your routes to Pattaya City, Jomtien Beach or the Eastern Seaboard. These homes span 3 floors in total. The ground floor has a bright open plan living room, dining area and an impressive fitted Western kitchen with built in washing machine, oven and even has a central breakfast bar island. The 1st floor has a large master bedroom with en-suite bathroom, and a slightly smaller 2nd bedroom with en-suite bedroom. The top floor boasts a breathtaking 6 metre vaulted ceiling, a secondary living room (perfect as TV room) with its own small kitchenette and 2 further bedrooms and en-suite bathrooms. This level also includes another en-suite guest bedroom. Outside there is a small garden and a fantastic private Jacuzzi tub as well. The whole house has been furnished well by the owner with huge 55” LED wall mounted TV’s, soft leather sofa’s, built in furniture in many rooms and beautiful artwork and decorations around the house. If you are interested in the house, it is recommended to come and view because it looks much, much better than the photographs show. Owned in Company Name which can make this purchase very cheap to transfer. Call us on +6638411250 or Email info@cornerstone.co.th to make an appointment.

Situated on Soi Bun Kanchana (Watboon) which is only a short walk from Jomtien Beach, Paradise Park Condominium has a garden area, large swimming pool, and gymnasium. The unit comes fully furnished and has a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area. This unit is on the 8th floor and even has sea views. 10,000 Baht a month, really is a bargain for long term rental of 12 months and above. Please contact your friendly Cornerstone Real Estate team for further details on 0838 411 250 or Email info@cornerstone.co.th

Laguna Beach Resort 3. Completed in 2018 this resort style project has a breathtaking central lagoon with rock waterfalls, multiple pools, tropical landscaping and plenty of seating & sunbathing areas. This 5th floor studio apartment is well furnished and comes with a fitted European kitchenette, full air conditioning, good sized balcony, built-in wardrobe and quality bathroom. From the apartment you can enjoy great views of the whole project and pools. Located in Jomtien close to 2nd road, this complex is only a few minutes drive to the beach, a good selection of restaurants and bars, shops & supermarkets, and banks, clinics, pharmacies and other day-to-day requirements. Available for renting with a minimum 12 months rental contract and a 2 month security deposit. Send us an Email or contact the office for more details, or to arrange a viewing – Tel: +6638411250 or Email: info@cornerstone.co.th

Ananya Beachfront Condominium Wongamat. This is a fantastic high-end beachfront location with a beautiful stretch of sandy beach right outside. Sitting here you can really unwind and enjoy the tropical sunshine and surroundings, and the city illuminations at night are very impressive. Wongamat is a very popular residential area as it has a large selection of local and Western beachfront restaurants & bars, small shops and grocery stores, plus there is a regular flow of taxis going to and from Pattaya City. Each of the units within this project are large and exclusive so creates an amazing high-end atmosphere that has just a limited number of residents. This very spacious 78 sqm one-bedroom unit is well designed and finished to a good European standard. The layout offers a big open plan living room, with a kitchen that is a modern European style with space saving storage, and includes built in oven & microwave. The master bedroom provides a luxury en-suite bathroom with Jacuzzi bathtub, and storage. There is also a large balcony at the front of the living room, big enough for 4 people to enjoy the outside living and the amazing views of the infinity communal swimming pool and the beach. Available for renting with a minimum 12 months rental contract and a 2 month security deposit. Send us an Email or contact the office for more details, or to arrange a viewing - Tel: +6638411250 or Email: info@cornerstone.co.th

Patta Village. This is recognised as one of the most popular villages in East Pattaya because of the amenities, neighbourhood and location along Soi Siam Country Club. You enter through the security gates and are met with diligent security guards who always check I.D from everyone. As you drive through the village you can see that all internal roads are very wide, with plenty of “traffic calming” humps to slow down all drivers. In the centre of the village is a clubhouse where lots of families gather to watch their children play in the communal gardens, play park and swimming pool. There is also a gymnasium here at the clubhouse also. This 3 bedroom detached house has 2 floors. There is off road parking at the front of the house and small gardens to the front and rear. The lower floor has an open plan living room, dining area, toilet and fitted Western kitchen. Outside is a covered patio area that has a washing machine, laundry area and space for storage. Upstairs are all 3 bedrooms, and 2 bathrooms. The master bedroom has a private en-suite bathroom and the 2 guest bedrooms share the guest bathroom. The whole property has been decorated and furnished really well, plus wallpaper and built in furniture set the whole house off. Patta Village is located close to Mabprachan Lake, lots of International schools, golf courses, Thai & Western restaurants and a main high street full of local shops and stores. It is available for rent on a long term 12 month basis with a 2 month security deposit. Call us on 038411250 or email info@cornerstone.co.th to make an appointment to view.

The Blue Residence. Located along Sukhumvit Road this condominium has 2 eight storey buildings that stand either side of a central pool and gymnasium. It offers easy access into Jomtien & Pattaya City, plus using the railway bypass it is possible to reach the Eastern Seaboard locations as you can get onto the surrounding motorways/highways quickly. Inside, this property has recently been renovated to keep it fresh, new and modern. The corner unit gives great views and plenty of natural light. All through the unit is good quality furniture, and the new Western kitchen offers plenty of work space and storage. There is a nice spacious bathroom which can be accessed directly from the living room, or bedroom. At 52 square metres this is quite generous space for a 1 bedroom unit. Come to take a look for yourself. It is available for rent on a long term 12 month basis with a 2 month security deposit. Call us on 038411250 or email info@cornerstone.co.th to make an appointment to view.

Thanyawan City Home 1, located in the middle of Boonsampan (Khao Noi), very close to the Topps Chilled store that stocks some of the finest groceries in the whole city. This 3 bedroom, 3 bathroom house, comes fully furnished, with air conditioning throughout the property. It has 2 kitchens and a washing machine. The whole property is currently being repainted. The house is ready for long term rental of 12 months and above and the price is negotiable for the right tenant. Please contact your friendly Cornerstone team on 038 411250 or email us on info@cornerstone.co.th

Soi Thepnimit Private Pool Villa. This spacious family home is positioned within a small street of other large foreign owned pool villas. The single storey home has a 580 sq.metre land plot which has a nice landscaped garden and its own private swimming pool. The home is very spacious and provides a large living room, separate Western kitchen, and 3 family (en-suite) bedrooms. Each has been well decorated and furnished, and all rooms have air conditioning. This area is very close to Highway 36 and really convenient for Regent International school and the Eastern Seaboard estates. The property is for sale and owned in a Thai Name and all of the taxes and transfer fees shall be shared equally 50/50.

Grand Tanyawan Village. Location in South Pattaya, just off from Thappraya Road the location is super convenient to be within easy reach of Pattaya City or Jomtien Beaches. The 3 bedroom home is in a village that has a communal swimming pool, and is being offered for rent fully furnished. Available with a 12 month rent contract and a 2 month security deposit. Call us on 038411250 or email info@cornerstone.co.th for further details or to arrange a viewing

Acqua Condominium. Located between Jomtien Beach and Jomtien 2nd road, this complex offers excellent access to everywhere. Jomtien is a vibrant beach, with a wide tree lined promenade, and lots of water sport activities. Along both the beach road and Jomtien 2nd road are huge choices of local Thai and International restaurants, beer bar complex's, shopping outlets and public transport options. This top floor studio looks over the whole resort and communal pool. The unit has full height windows and pool view balcony. Inside there are lots of fitted furniture and a great Euro kitchen. It is available for rent on a long term 12 month basis with a 2 month security deposit. Call us on 038411250 or email info@cornerstone.co.th to make an appointment to view

Acqua Condominium. This project is located in Jomtien, just 50 metres from Jomtien beach. Jomtien is a vibrant beach, with a wide tree lined promenade, and lots of water sport activities, plus offers a huge choices of local Thai and International restaurants, beer bar complex's, shopping outlets and public transport options. This location has convenient access to everywhere. Acqua Condominium provides all co-owners with a huge central communal swimming pool, plus lots of other activities such as a large fitness center, games room, pool & ping pong tables and a children's soft playroom. This top floor studio looks over the whole resort and communal pool. The unit has full height windows and pool view balcony. Inside there are lots of fitted furniture and a great Euro kitchen. It is available for rent on a long term 12 month basis with a 2 month security deposit. Call us on 038411250 or email info@old.cornerstone.co.th to make an appointment to view.

Located between Jomtien Beach Road and Jomtien 2nd Road this low-rise condo project offers very easy access to the beach, all of the local shops, restaurants and nightlife plus right outside is the regular Baht Bus back And forth to Pattaya City. This 1 bedroom unit is one of very few units that have ground floor direct swimming pool access. Inside, the condo has a fitted kitchenette, is fully furnished with modern style furnishings, and has air conditioning, a flat screen TV, built in wardrobe and a nice bathroom. Acqua Condominium has a large central swimming pool that has lots of seating areas all around and a BBQ area. There is fitness room, games room with ping pong & pool table, underground parking, cleaning service, Cable TV and 24 hour security. It is available to buy in Foreign Name (freehold) ownership with any property taxes and transfer fees split on a 50/50 basis. Also available for rent on a long term 12 month basis with a 2 month security deposit. Call us on 038411250 or email info@cornerstone.co.th to make an appointment to view.

Grand Condo. This direct beachfront condo sits on one of the most prime beachfront plots in the whole of Pattaya City. This is one of few condos that can actually boast having "direct" beach access. There is no road to separate the building from the beach, and the views from this 16th floor unit are truly amazing! This large 165 sq.metre property has a large over-sized balcony to enjoy the uninterrupted views out across the Gulf Of Thailand and the Koh Larn island on the horizon. There is a large open-plan living room that is spacious enough for a separated dining area and fully fitted European kitchen. In total there are 3 full sized bedrooms, and 2 bathrooms. The master bedroom has an adjoining en-suite bathroom, and the 2nd bathroom has been renovated to have a concealed washing machine and dryer. Grand Condo provides a well landscaped environment throughout the grounds, as well as a large communal swimming pool, an excellent on-site management and maintenance team and overall a very peaceful & quiet beach setting. It is possible to walk to supermarkets, beach bars & restaurants and the location is on the "Baht Bus" route so getting into the city is very easy. Call Cornerstone Real Estate on +6638411250 or Email info@cornerstone.co.th for further details, or to make an appointment.

Northpoint Condominium. Located in Wongamat, the building comprises of two high rise towers which are some of the tallest in Thailand. The South tower is 54 floors and the North tower is 46 floors. set on a huge 80 metre wide beachfront plot, there are stunning views of the sea from all areas. Wongamat Beach is one of Pattaya’s Northern beachfronts and as well as clean wide sandy beaches, there are impressive views to the neighbouring island, and the skyline of Downtown Pattaya across the bay. The beachfront infinity pools have specially zoned pool decks, along with a fun pool with a 20 metre jungle slide and a children's playground. The building also boats a state of the art fitness centre, sauna, tennis courts, sky gardens, beachside al fresco dining choices, private covered parking and 24-hour security. Inside this 20th floor, 102.72m² property you will find a 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom layout. The open plan layout offers totally useable space and a fantastic sea view balcony. The spacious living/dining room has good natural light and there is a long European fitted kitchen at the far end. Each bedroom is either side of this living area. The master bedroom has a grand en-suite bathroom with luxury fittings and a jacuzzi bathtub. Both bedrooms have floor to ceiling fitted wardrobes, mood lighting and full height windows to enjoy the views. Outside is a large balcony offering uninterrupted panoramic sea views. Currently available in Foreign Name ownership due to the foreign quota % (accurate at the time of writing). The taxes shall be paid by the Seller and the 2% transfer fee shall be split 50/50 with the new Buyer

Baan Anda. This well-appointed village situated in the East of Pattaya, on Soi Toon Klom – Tan man 9, extremely close to the Tara Pattana International School. Nearby you have Khao Talo or Khao Noi, with Pattaya city being just 20 minutes away. Popular with expats and working expats a like as close to highways 7 and 36, both within 15 minutes. The village has a nice communal pool, restaurant, laundry and 24-hour security guards also This Balinese style house is 300 sqm of living area and 326 sq wah of land, being one of the largest plots within the estate. When entering the property, you have a breathtaking feel of the sweeping tropical garden. The property comes fully furnished to a high standard, with all modern appliances and maids’ room with additional Thai Kitchen. The property is owned in Company name. Call Cornerstone Real Estate on +6638411250 or Email info@cornerstone.co.th for further details, or to make an appointment.

Bang Saray Land Plot. Located less than 1 kilometre from a nice quiet part of the beach, this plot offers practical 760 square metre size, perfect for a nice home. The title deed is held in Company name and the price is calculated at 19,750 Baht Pr sq.wah. This is very competitive considering the land plot has now been clear & filled higher than the road. The brand new street has just been re-surfaced, and there is electricity immediately available. The area has lots of brand new houses as buyers start to take advantage of this great beach side community. Call us on +6638411250 or Email info@cornerstone.co.th to make an appointment

titles.title: 65 wah² (260sq.m) Land on Beach Side Bang Saray

descriptions.description: Bang Saray Land Plot. This 260 square metre (65 wah²) plot is located less than 1 kilometre from one of the quietest parts of Bang Saray beach. This is a lovely clean residential area with many new homes being built now. This area has rapidly become a highly desirable location to live and to invest. The most recent additions are the extended Bangkok motorway and the staged upgrades to grow the local U-Tapao airport into International status and become Thailand's 3rd busiest airport. Add to this plenty of tourist attractions, theme/water parks, family activities, and many Thai & International restaurants it now makes living here very convenient. It is also possible to get to Bang Saray's main beach in just 2-3 minutes or travel into Pattaya City easily. Owned in Company Name, this land plot has been recently back filled so any buyer can start to build a home whenever they are ready. Call Cornerstone Real Estate on +6638411250 or Email info@cornerstone.co.th for further details, or to make an appointment.

Amazon Residence Condo. Completed in 2014, this low-rise condominium project is located close to Jomtien Beach, which is 10 minutes from Downtown Pattaya City. Jomtien Beach has lots of cool restaurants & beach bars along the seafront. There are also water sport activities along the beach, plus regular public transport back and forth to Pattaya City. Each of the buildings surround a lagoon pool and tropical garden which has a multi level lagoon swimming pool right through the centre of the development. In the middle of the pool is an island with seating areas to relax and at the far end is a beautiful waterfall. The unit is a 35 sq.metres 1 bedroom layout with practical living room, European kitchen, a 7th floor city view balcony and an en-suite bedroom. It is sold fully furnished and owned in Thai Name. The SELLER will pay all transfer fees. Call Cornerstone Real Estate on +6638411250 or Email info@cornerstone.co.th for further details, or to make an appointment.

Amazon Residence Condo. This is a stunning resort style condominium close to Jomtien Beach which has a unique 3 level lagoon swimming pool right through the centre of the development. The Amazon Residence comprises of 4 low-rise buildings surrounding the pool and tropical garden, plus in addition to this has smaller Jacuzzi and shallow pools for children. In the middle of the pool is an island with seating areas to relax and at the far end is a beautiful waterfall. This fully furnished 2 bedroom unit is set on the 8th floor of the building with views over Jomtien beach. Finished to a high standard the property has 2 spacious bedrooms, each with direct bathroom access. The open plan living room has plenty of space, and easily allows for a dining table and fully fitted European kitchen including refrigerator, electric cooker, hob and extractor hood. Jomtien Beach has lots of cool restaurants & beach bars along the seafront. There are also watersport activities along the beach, plus regular public transport back and forth to Pattaya City. Call Cornerstone Real Estate on +6638411250 or Email info@cornerstone.co.th for further details or to make an appointment

Pornthep Garden Ville 5. This East Pattaya village offers excellent access onto the Bangkok Motorway and the other highway routes that lead to all areas of the Eastern Seaboard, the wide range of International schools, Pattaya City and over 15 International Golf Courses. Located just 3 kilometres out from the city, it is possible to be in Downtown Pattaya, or the latest shopping malls in less than 10 minutes. The seller of this property brought the plot brand new when the village was being developed, and purchased a "double corner plot". This house is a larger re-designed model and the manicured back garden is a real pleasure to sit in and relax! Inside, the house has been decorated and furnished well. There is a very big fitted Western kitchen with lots of cabinet and worktop space. As the land plot is more generous than normal, the house is not squashed against the perimeter walls so that there is a good air-flow around the house and its nice and bright too. The master bedroom has an adjoining en-suite bathroom, with the other 2 bedrooms sharing the 2nd guest bathroom between them. Outside, the private garden has lots of mature trees and plants, and for anybody interested it is definitely big enough to add a large private swimming pool if desired. Pornthep Garden Ville provides all co-owners with a nice communal swimming pool, plus there is 24 hour security on the front entrance gate to the village. The property is owned in Thai Name with taxes & transfer fees split 50/50. Call Cornerstone Real Estate on +6638411250 or Email info@cornerstone.co.th for further details or to make an appointment.

Wongamat Beach Villa. This small 2 bedroom house sits on a private 180 sq.metre plot just a few hundred metres from the beautiful Wongamat beach. This simple property offers a really practical design, utilising all the space properly. There is a nice terrace and small garden area at the front, and a totally private larger back garden. The living room has high balcony front doors and windows on one side, each of the bedrooms is also well lit. The master bedroom has an en-suite bedroom. The kitchen is to the rear of the house with access outside to the large decked backyard. There is air conditioning in the house, plus some furniture. Owned in Thai Name, the seller will split all taxes and transfer fees 50/50 with the new buyer. Contact Cornerstone Real Estate: Email: info@cornerstone.co.th or call +6638411250 for further details.

titles.title: 200 wah² (800 sq.m) Land Bang Saray Beach Side

descriptions.description: This 200 wah² (800 sq.m) land plot is ready to build upon right away. There is a brand new road, government electricity and water immediately available. All neighbouring plots have been sold recently so there will be many brand new homes around the area making a great beach side community. It is possible to get to the beach in just 2-3 minutes by motorcycle, and the main Bang Saray "Walking Street" stretch of beach is not too far away either. Pattaya City can be reached easily, and the newly completed Bangkok - Pattaya motorway exits not too far from Bang Saray so gives travel time to Bangkok within 90 minutes. The title deed for the plot is owned in Company Ownership so the total transfer costs are inexpensive. Call us on +6638411250 or Email info@cornerstone.co.th to make an appointment

This is a 3 storey direct beachfront luxury home which gives full access onto Pratumnak beach, and stunning views of the sea from all 3 floors of the building. Designed to a modern taste it offers a private swimming pool and private parking at the front of the property. As you step inside there is a large Western kitchen, and an open plan living space with a dramatic 2 floor cathedral ceiling atrium. On the 2nd floor there are two full en-suite bedrooms each with built in furniture and air conditioning. The beach-side room has a beach balcony and the rear room has an additional living room of its own! Rising up to the top 3rd floor is an amazing Penthouse which has been converted from 2 full bedrooms to be used presently as a master bedroom and sea-view office! This is a totally unique opportunity to have an extremely rare beachfront house in the whole of Pattaya! The neighbouring is very quiet and exclusive however the city centre is just minutes away. The neighborhood itself features a royal residence, luxury condos and villas and the five-star Centara Grand Hotel is across the street on the inland side of the property. Also the paved footpaths along the beach are all being upgraded now and the water is just metres away. The home is priced to be sold essentially unfurnished, and the property is currently owned in Thai company name. The owner will consider a partially furnished sale if desired. Viewings are by 24 hour appointment only. Send us an Email or contact the office for more details, or to arrange a viewing Tel: +6638411250 Email: info@old.cornerstone.co.th

This large property offers a villa, guest cottage all in the same grounds. The estate has a 4 bedroom villa, a 2 bedroom guest cottage, stunning private swimming pool, Jacuzzi and waterfall, all set within a lush landscaped tropical garden. It is a bargain, awaiting to be captured now! The estate is situated only 12 kms (15 Minutes) from North Pattaya, with a direct motorway link into town. The motorway is only 2 kms from the Villa. In the immediate area are 5 International schools, 12 World Class Golf Courses, lots of family activities, beaches, lakes and tourist attractions. Main Property - A luxurious 4 Bedroom Villa, with large 8m x 5m private swimming pool, waterfall and Jacuzzi. The Sala Bar has a snooker/pool table and table football and behind is a BBQ area so that you can entertain your friends in style. The 400 sq.m Villa is set in large, tropical planted grounds of 350 sq.wah (1,400 sqm) of coconut plantation. Living here offers total privacy, no neighbours, and not overlooked by anyone. Surrounded by a tall 8'' perimeter wall that is well illuminated with automatic lighting, also the pool and waterfall are lit by LED as well. The Villa has 4 large bedrooms which all having en-suite bathroom facilities. They all have air-conditioning and overhead fans, T.V. & DVD Players. The open plan lounge a fantastic Western kitchen at one end, which offers lots of storage and a central preparation island. All appliances are built in: an oven, gas hob, fridge freezer, microwave oven and drinking water machine. From the sofa you can also sit and enjoy the views of the gardens. Adjoining the living room is a wide covered terrace, with a winding (covered) pathway to the sala bar. Enjoy the outside sitting area for watching TV, eating, or drinking a cool beer. A new pool table has recently been added for entertainment and there is also a new music centre with surround sound speaker system to enjoy your music, or sing-along to Karaoke. The Villa has 50mps WiFi internet, an alarm system, safety deposit box, and smoke alarms. The car parking area is covered and has space for 4 cars. and has electric gates. Detached Guest Cottage - The cottage is completely isolated from the main villa which can be accessed directly from a separate rear entrance! There is also a large wall with private locked gate between the main villa and this small guest house. There is a lounge area with an attached bedroom to the side, a 2nd bedroom, and a bathroom. Between the rooms is an open kitchen, with all necessary cooking utensils, 3 store rooms and a tool room with attic storage. Call Cornerstone Real Estate on +6638411250 or Email info@cornerstone.co.th for further details, or to make an appointment,

D-Sign Homes is a brand new village of 15 luxury homes. The village is being developed in Huay Yai which is rapidly becoming a “hot spot” for Ex Pat families with children needing the higher end International schools, or easy access to the industrial hubs and shipping ports that form the Eastern Seaboard. In total there will be 15 bespoke modern contemporary villas. Each will be a 2 storey design with 3 or 4 bedrooms. The promotional price is for the entry villa that sits on a 60 sq.wah (240 sq.metres) land plot, and has a 190 sq.metre living area. The 2 storey floor plan is for a 3 Bedroom, 3 ½ Bathroom layout The price includes the construction of the house on the land, bathrooms completed, and 4 air conditioning units (cassette type in the living room). After this, the developer offers a choice of optional extras should the buyer wish: 550,000 Baht = Swimming Pool 400,000 Baht = Western Kitchen: washing machine, fridge, microwave, hob, oven and extractor 400,000 Baht = Built in furniture: wardrobes/drawers, TV units, dressing areas 475,000 Baht = Furniture Pack: beds/mattresses, bedside tables, lamps, curtains, sofa, coffee table, mirrors, wall decorations, dining table/chairs, outdoor furniture & 3 x tv's Payment plans are flexible. The base payment plan is as follows: 100,000 Baht - Reservation 500,000 Baht - Upon signing contract (within 14 days) Payments over 10 months (maximum) 40% upon completion Build time 6 months

Sefton Park is a small gated community in Pong, East Pattaya. This location is on the Eastern side of the Mabprachan reservoir and very close to the International schools, Siam Country Club Golf Courses and the Motorways & Highways that facilitate the Eastern seaboard. Lots of Ex Pat families chose this location as it is very family friendly. There is a real community spirit as many families know each other as their children visit the same schools, or the same after school activities. There is a local market which sells all the daily fresh food, fruit and vegetables, plus there is a Tesco Express and 7/11 on the main road too. This 3 bedroom house is a modern style home that is available fully furnished. The home has an L-Shaped Western kitchen with built in oven and comes with a washing machine as well. Overall this is a very pleasant village with natural shrubs separating the homes. Send us an Email or contact the office for more details, or to arrange a viewing. Tel: +6638411250 Email: info@cornerstone.co.th

titles.title: 8 Rai Land Plot in Huay Yai

descriptions.description: Huay Yai. This large 8 Rai (12,800 sq.m) of development land is located directly beside one of the new Motorway flyovers that joins Bangkok with the Southern beaches in Jomtien. It is large enough to be transformed into a new housing estate of between 8 - 16 homes or for a commercial premises with excellent road frontage. The 8 Rai plot had been cut over 10 years ago in to eight 1 Rai (1,600 sq.m) plots and a further title deed for internal road access to each. The plot has good drainage and immediate connections to the city power & water supplies. Owned in a Company name this makes the purchase much easier for any developer as it can be used as the operating Thai Company. The total price is based on a Per Rai price of 3.9m Baht (8 x 3.9m = 31.2m Baht) Call Cornerstone Real Estate on +6638411250 or Email info@cornerstone.co.th for further details or to make an appointment

titles.title: 1 Rai (1,608sq.m) Land Plot on Phoenix Gold Golf Course

descriptions.description: Phoenix Gold Golf Course is one of Pattaya's leading courses and is within 25 minutes of the city. The 27 hole course comprises of three 9 holes courses (Ocean, Mountain & Lakes) with each offering differing views of the countryside of coastline. Phoenix Gold Golf Course has been popular with Pattaya Expats for many years, and is now under new management with new investment going into the whole site. Now the course is recognised on the Asian Tours with championships being held throughout the year. This 1 Rai land plot is on a sloping site that from the highest point will allow views over all of a Par 3 golf hole (from tee to green), plus sights of a further green from the preceding hole. All co-owners have access to the club house and its onsite restaurant, plus full use of the communal swimming pool and tennis court. There are security guards on the front entrance who patrol the course all day & night. The title deed is held in Company name so taking over will be minimal costs. Send us an Email or contact the office for more details, or to arrange a viewing Tel: +6638411250 Email: info@cornerstone.co.th

Sansuk Town 2. This is a modern townhouse estate in East Pattaya that was completed in 2018. The properties are 2 storey with a alrge open plan ground floor living area and a 2 bedroom layout upstairs. There is a good sized front area to the house which can be used for off roads parking, however this owner has tiled the space so it is also a nice space to sit outside. Downstairs is a clean and bright living area that extends all the way to the back of the home where there is a small guest toilet, a fitted kitchen and a rear outdoor space that has been covered and a washing machine installed. Upstairs both bedrooms have use of the large bathroom. The master bedroom boasts lots of fitted furniture and a small balcony. The smaller rear bedroom is also a good size with nice furnishings. The home is great value for money for a long term tenant, and it comes fully furnished. Call Cornerstone Real Estate on +6638411250 or Email info@cornerstone.co.th to make an appointment to view the property

Club Royal Wongamat. This low-rise resort style condominium offers great communal facilities and it’s just 50 metres from a nice quiet and private beach. At the centre of the complex is a huge swimming pool and some nice water features. There is plenty of sunbathing areas around the pool, plus there is a rooftop terrace, from where there are views of both the sea and the Sanctuary of Truth temple. Also onsite is a full fitness centre, a convenient minimart, secure underground car parking and 24 hour security. This 2 bedroom property boasts the best position in the whole project. Located on the top floor (8th) with views of the sea, and down over the pool area below. With 73 sq.m of living space this is a great family apartment. There is a Western fitted kitchen and a bright living room with the sea view balcony beyond. The 2 bedrooms are generous sizes, and the master bedroom has an en-suite bathroom. Both have floor to ceiling wardrobes and full view windows. Owned in Foreign (freehold) name this also makes the property highly valuable. All the taxes and transfer fees shall be split on a 50/50 basis with the buyer. Call Cornerstone Real Estate on +6638411250 or Email info@cornerstone.co.th for further details, or to make an appointment

Grand Garden Home Hill. Prices in this village start at 4,900,000 Baht and include: Private Swimming Pool (salt water) Fitted European kitchen (with appliances) Built-In Wardrobes Hot Water system & Fitted Bathroom Cabinets Landscaped Garden Reserve Water Storage System & High Pressure Water Pump This brand new village has land plots ranging from 100 wah² (400 sq.m) up to 177 wah² (708 sq.m) Located close to the upgraded U-Tapao International airport in Sattahip. Call Cornerstone Real Estate on +6638411250 or Email info@cornerstone.co.th for further details, or to make an appointment

Hyde Park 2 Condo. This is a low-rise condo that sits between South Pattaya and Jomtien. On the hill that rises to become Pratumnak Hill, this building offers the convenience of the city but in a much quieter neighbourhood. It is possible to step outside the building and be in the city centre by public transport in less than 5 minutes. The building provides a lovely rooftop pool where you can look over the city skyline, a fully equipped gymnasium and secure covered car & motorbike parking. This 3rd floor studio has been well decorated and furnished to accompany the fitted kitchen and built in furniture throughout the property. It is for sale and owned in Company Name which will be sold with the property, making it a very low cost transfer Send us an Email or contact the office for more details, or to arrange a viewing Tel: +6638411250 Email: info@cornerstone.co.th

Paragon Park. This village is in Huay Yai and features lovely mature landscaped streets, underground electricity and a small handful of private villas on large land plots. This 3 bedroom villa has a huge open plan living room and Western kitchen as you enter the home giving the feeling of space. It is possible to see the pool & gardens beyond. Each of the bedrooms has its own private en-suite bathroom, the master bedroom has a space which can be re-designed for walk through wardrobes, plus there is a guest bathroom which has been altered to include a washing machine. 2 of the bedrooms can walk straight out into the garden & pool area. This outdoor space is at the rear of the property so it is very nice and private. There is a covered area close to the pool so you can choose to be in, or out of the sun. The sale of the property shall include all of the high quality furniture. Huay Yai is a family area of East Pattaya, which is less than 20 minutes from the city centre and beaches. Owned in Company Name the costs to transfer are very low. Contact Cornerstone Real Estate: Email: info@cornerstone.co.th or call +6638411250 for further details.

titles.title: 154.5 sqw (618sq.m) Land for Sale Mabprachan Lake

descriptions.description: Land for sale in the Horseshoe Point / Mabprachan Lake area. 154.5 sqw or 618 sqm of filled land. Already walled. Electric supply already in place. Has water and drainage . 200 metres from the Lake itself. Contact Cornerstone Real Estate: Email: info@cornerstone.co.th or call +6638411250 for further details.

Supalai Mare Condominium Jomtien. This property is located within a huge high-rise development on Thepprasit road, in Jomtien. This main road runs directly from Sukhumvit Road into Jomtien, and the long stretch of beach is just 1km away. This 28th floor unit offers some amazing views over Jomtien and Pattaya City. It is a 32 sq.m sea view studio unit that is fully furnished and includes a built-in European style kitchen and all appliances. Supalai Mare Condo Facilities include: A massive infinity swimming pool, an equipped gymnasium & sauna, a high floor sky lounge and library, plus 24hr security and CCTV. The condo is available with a long term rental contract and a 2 month security deposit. It is also available for Sale in Company Name and a 50/50 split on all legal fees. Call Cornerstone Real Estate on +6638411250 or Email info@cornerstone.co.th for further details, or to make an appointment

Supalai Mare Condominium Jomtien. Built and complete in 2017 this high rise condominium is located close to Jomtien beach, along Thepprasit Road. This 34th floor two bedroom condo has some simply breath-taking views of Jomtien Beach, Pattaya City and out across the Gulf Of Thailand. Its even possible to see the Koh Larn island. In total the property is 72.58 sq.m in size and this includes a spacious living room, a master bedroom with en-suite bathroom, a 2nd bedroom and separate guest bathroom, plus a fitted European kitchen and built in appliances. Supalai Mare Condo has lots of communal facilities which include: A massive infinity swimming pool, a poolside gymnasium & sauna, a high floor sky lounge and library, plus 24hr security and CCTV. The building is very convenient to get to the Tesco Lotus or Big C Super Center’s on Sukhumvit Road, a whole array of dining experiences from local Thai to International and fine dining, the Bangkok airport coach and many styles of bar, and pub along Jomtien beach road or the smaller streets. Jomtien beach is just 1km away, and Pattaya City is just a short motorcycle, or taxi ride away The condo is available, only with a long term rental contract and a 2 month security deposit. Send us an Email or contact the office for more details, or to arrange a viewing Tel: +6638411250 or Email: info@cornerstone.co.th

Phoenix Luxury Retreat. This is a totally unique property located on a one rai (1,600sq.m) plot of land within the Phoenix Gold Golf Course, which is between Bang Saray and Ban Amphur. From here it is just a few minutes from Ocean Marina, Khao Chee Chan Image (Buddha Mountain), Silverlake Vineyard, Nong Nooch tropical gardens. For golf lovers there are also another 18 top class golf courses within 30 minutes from the villa. Pattaya City is close enough to provide evening options with its many shopping and entertainment venues and now with mobile taxi apps it is really easy to get anywhere! Also, there is a choice of stunning tropical beaches, 2 water-parks (Ramayana and Amazone Cartoon Network) close by. getting to and from the property is also very easy with the new direct Bangkok to Pattaya motorway which exits just a few kms away, plus the local U-Tapao airprt with lots of domestic flights, and the current upgrades to make it Thailand's 3rd largest airport in just a few years time. Because of its multipurpose design this beautiful and unique property can be enjoyed as a luxury private home, with lots of space reserved for family & friends, or it could be purchased for use a holiday rental villa, or even a resort. Its 6 individual high quality furnished Villas and a separate large Club House with bar, fully equipped European kitchen and entertainment area are built around a large split level pool that includes custom features, such as lights, bridges and a waterfall. The pool is walled on 3 sides, the fourth side opening onto a lake. Additionally, there is an extensive 3 level roof terrace with a bar, a BBQ and multiple seating and entertainment areas, which can hold up to 150 people. It provides panoramic views of the surrounding golf course, countryside and lake. Each of the five 47 sq.m. villas are self-contained individually decorated living unit and comes with a kitchen and an en-suite bathroom. The larger 72 sq.m. villa features an en suite-bathroom and larger kitchen as well as sleeping arrangements for up to 5 people. A newly constructed self contained staff accommodation unit has full facilities for operating and maintaining the property. Off road and undercover parking is also available on the property. Originally built in 2009, the property has just been completely renovated and upgraded to the highest standards and is ready for immediate use. Unique multipurpose Property on Phoenix Gold Golf Club Pattaya Estate for Sale Total land size: 1.600 sq.m. Property size: 800 sq.m. 5 individual villas 47 sq.m. 1 individual villa 72 sq.m. 6 bedrooms, 6 bathrooms, 1 toilet 1 Club House with fully equipped European kitchen, TV-lounge and bar 3 level rooftop terrace with bar Split level pool with waterfall

Large property in the exclusive Miami Villas project around the Mabprachan lake area. The house has been built to a western standard and boasts an impressive 420 sqm of living area, which sits on 756 sqm of land Downstairs you have a large master bedroom with en-suite and bedrooms (1 Downstairs and 3 upstairs) Furnished 5 Bathrooms, Living Room and cloakroom, Very Large European Kitchen and storeroom and office. Other features include 4 Storage Rooms, Garage (with roller door), 6 Air Conditioners, Foam insulation in roof, uPVC windows and terrace doors with tinted glass and a Steel front door Outside is the nice freeform Private Swimming Pool

View Talay 2. This is one of the most popular condos in the whole of the city. Its location makes it perfect for those who wish to be within walking distance (or public transport) to everything. A short walk outside this complex and you will find a huge choice of restaurants from Thai, European, Russian and fine dining. If you wish to cater for yourself, then there are 2 large food marts on the doorstep and the massive Tesco Lotus Hyper Mall a few minutes away on motorcycle. Jomtien Beach is a 3km stretch of sandy coastline which is a great place to soak up the sun, or play the various water-sports, and beach sports on offer. Hopping on the local Baht Bus can whisk you into Downtown Pattaya in less than 10 minutes where you can indulge yourself in all high street shopping, catch a movie, or let your hair down in Pattaya's vibrant nightlife. This 1 bedroom condo has a superb layout as it has been converted from 2 studio units previously. This creates a large living room with open plan Euro kitchen and balcony then through to a separate bedroom, en-suite bathroom and balcony. View Talay has 2 huge communal swimming pools for each of the buildings and inside the building is a mini mart, and a few laundry shops and a small Thai & Euro restaurant. Contact Cornerstone Real Estate: Email: info@old.cornerstone.co.th or call +6638411250 for further details.

Grand Lotus Place. This gated village is located in Jomtien close to the Tesco Lotus Supermarket on Sukhumvit Road. It is accessed from a small quiet street and there are only 23 properties in the village. This single storey house is a 3 bedroom design, with 2 bathrooms, a fitted kitchen and dual level living area. The master bedroom has its own en-suite bathrooms and the property is for sale fully furnished. The property is owned in Company Name so can be very low cost to take over. Send us an Email or contact the office for more details, or to arrange a viewing Tel: +6638411250 Email: info@cornerstone.co.th

This high rise tower is located in a prime position along Pattaya 2nd road at the Northern end, close by to the newly renovated Central Marina, and the brand new Terminal 21 shopping mall. Pattaya 2nd road is full of attractions, and interesting nightlife. It is possible to walk to Pattaya Beach Road very easily, or jump on the public transport which passes every minute! This 32 Sq.m apartment sits on the 7th floor of the main tower, and is offered for sale fully furnished. Overall the room is well designed for space and features a small kitchenette, a glass partition separating the living room from bedroom, air conditioning in both rooms and a nice bathroom. Centric Sea provides a range of facilities which include a sky pool, sky fitness and sky gardens. The property is owned in Foreign name with the land office tax & transfer fees split 50/50 between buyer and seller Call Cornerstone Real Estate on +6638411250 or Email info@cornerstone.co.th for further details, or to make an appointment

This large family home is located inside the Horseshoe point Country Club which has lots of great family activities on site. Just 1 km away is Mabprachan lake and Siam Country Club where there are lots of restaurants, bars and shops. Whispering Palm is a small development with security at the front gate, and wide shrub lined roads. This 2 storey property has over 760 sq.m of landscaped gardens, patio and private pool to enjoy. The home has 3 full sized en-suite bedrooms, a huge downstairs living area and a fully equipped Western kitchen. It is rented fully furnished, and the rental price "includes" the costs to clean the pool, cut the gardens and pest control. It is available for rent on a long term 12 month basis with a 2 month security deposit. Call us on 038411250 or email info@cornerstone.co.th to make an appointment.

City Garden is a well-known condominium building located between 2 nd Road and Soi Buakhao. This is the perfect spot to live with the beach, the restaurants, bars and shops so close by. It isalso a quiet location where you don’t get annoyed by the noise from the bars. The complex has plenty of parking a gym and a good sized swimming pool. The apartment is on the second floor and like all City Garden apartments is built with comfort in mind. 46m² is plenty of space for one or two people to spread out in. The apartment is fullyfurnished with quality furnishings and available for rent on a long term basis. Call Cornerstone Real Estate on +66 384 11250 or Email info@cornerstone.co.th for further details, or to make an appointment.

Siam Place. This village with 24 hour security is located along Siam Country Club Road in East Pattaya. It is just a few minutes away from a huge 7 day market, a choice of banks, convenience stores and other local shops. This residential area is popular with families as it is much quieter that the bustling city, and it offers convenience for getting to schools, family activities and working Expats needing to reach places within the Eastern Seaboard. This 3 bedroom property has a 280 sq.m plot with a nice sized garden (perfect for the kids) and is available to rent fully furnished. Siam Place provides residents with use of the communal swimming pool, plus there are friendly security guards day & night. It is available for rent on a long term 12 month basis with a 2 month security deposit. Call us on 038411250 or email info@old.cornerstone.co.th to make an appointment

titles.title: Villa Asiatic 4 Bed House in East Pattaya 416

descriptions.description: View Talay Villas. This established high end village is situated in Jomtien and is in walking distance to Jomtien beach and all local amenities such as: markets, shops, restaurants & bars, and is on the public transport (Baht Bus) routes. This good quality single storey private pool villa sits on a 240sq.m plot which is large enough to entertain plenty of family and friends outside easily. Inside, the home comes with nice built-in furniture and clean decorations. Another great feature is the practical built-in European kitchen which is next to open plan lounge and dining areas. There are 2 full sized bedrooms, with the master bedroom positioned so that it can see (and walk out into) the gardens, and private pool area. There is a furnished outdoor terrace by the private swimming pool as well. View Talay Villas has a lovely atmosphere with landscaped roads, plus a huge club house & communal swimming pool. It is available for rent on a long term 12 month basis with a 2 month security deposit. Call us on 038411250 or email info@old.cornerstone.co.th to make an appointment

The Residence Jomtien. A low rise condo with massive communal pool, and poolside gymnasium. Located in Jomtien it is possible to reach the beach within 5 minutes and is close to Rumpho market and the Baht Bus taxi routes. This property really does feel big with its 51 sq.m layout and that the views out from the balcony giving an infinite view. From the 4th floor balcony you look down over the communal pool. All of the decoration and furnishings are nice and of very good quality. It boasts a European kitchen, large living space, bathroom and air conditioning throughout. For Sale in Thai Name Ownership with 50/50 split taxes and transfer fees. For Rent on a long term basis only, with a 2 month security deposit. Call us on +6638411250 or Email info@old.cornerstone.co.th to make an appointment

The Vision. A tall tower positioned right on the highest point of Pratumnak Hill. From this 17th floor 1 bedroom condo unit there are incredible 180° views of Jomtien Bay, Pratumnak Beaches, the Gulf of Thailand and the Koh Larn island on the horizon. Finished to a high standard, the unit comes complete with a fitted European kitchen, built in wardrobes, 2 x air conditioning units, an en-suite bathroom and a larger than average sea-view balcony. The condominium provides lots of communal facilities such as an impressive "top floor' sea view swimming pool, and a mountainside view gymnasium, sauna, lobby and underground car-parking. Call Cornerstone Real Estate on +6638411250 or Email info@old.cornerstone.co.th for further details, or to make an appointment.

Tudor Court is tucked down Pratumnak Soi 3 which is a dead end road. There is very limited traffic so it is a lovely quiet spot. But it is easy access to Jomtien and Pattaya, to Cosy Beach and to local restaurants and bars. The beach is clean and uncrowded here also. The studio is 38m² and positioned on the 3rd floor. It is fully furnished and has a real airy feel to it. There is a balcony and a wet room. The condo has a large swimming pool and covered parking. Call Cornerstone Real Estate on +66 384 11250 or Email info@old.cornerstone.co.th for further details or to make an appointment.

Acqua Condo. Just 100 metres from Jomtien Beach this low-rise modern condo features a beautiful central lagoon pool, as well as a fitness centre, games room and library. This 4th floor studio is a total of 35 square metres and is available to rent fully furnished with views over the swimming pool. There is a nice modern fitted kitchen and bathroom, as well as a wall mounted LED TV and small balcony. It is available for rent on a long term 12 month basis with a 2 month security deposit. Also for sale in Thai Name ownership with a 50/50 split on all taxes & transfer fees. Call us on 038411250 or email info@old.cornerstone.co.th to make an appointment

This small complex has a gym, a swimming pool, 24 hour security guards and key card access. This apartment is on the 2nd floor, and is 38m² with a separate bedroom. Cosy Beach is part of the Pratumnak Hillside and is positioned between the bustling Pattaya City, and the calmer Jomtien Beach. Cosy Beach has a lovely quiet beach of its own, and it is just an 800 metre walk from The Cliff Condominium. The project includes a long communal swimming pool and a poolside gymnasium. There is underground carparking and a kids playground too. Available with 12 month rental contracts only, and the price "includes" private high speed internet. titles.title: 7 Bedroom Huge Private Pool House In Khao Talo

descriptions.description: Pattaya Hill 2 village is a high end secured community in the popular area of Khao Noi in East Pattaya. The village has nice wide internal roads leading to properties on larger than average land plots. Also, onsite there is a lovely communal swimming pool with ample shaded seating and has some of the best 24hr patrolling security. The main house offers a 3 bedroom, and 2 bathrooms. The master bedroom has an en-suite bathroom, a bathtub, and walk in shower, Then the 2nd bedroom and the guest bedroom which share a bathroom. There is also a 60 sqm external building that can be used as a guest house with toilet Reduced originally from 6.7 Million and can be sold at 4.95 Million Thai Baht The property will be sold fully furnished with only a few peronal belongings to be taken out. Owned and sold in Thai company name. Please contact you local Cornerstone Real Estate team for more information or to arrange a viewing on 038 411250 or info@cornerstone.co.th
Description Coming Soon

This is one of the older buildings in Jomtien and as such is built on a grander style than the newcomers. It is just 250m from the lovely Jomtien beach. It has a swimming pool, sauna and gym, and ample parking. It is located close to Soi Chaiyaphruek so a restaurant and a beer aren’t far away at all. The studio unit is 40m² and located on the 7th floor. The balcony is a good size to appreciate the sea breeze. There are built in wardrobes and plenty of storage space. Fully furnished with a small kitchen area, it’s a great spot to get away and relax. Call Cornerstone Real Estate on +66 384 11250 or Email info@old.cornerstone.co.th for further details or to make an appointment.

Maxx Central Condominium. If you are looking for a city centre location that offers a quieter surrounding to Pattaya 2nd road, or Soi Buakow, then Maxx Central Condo shouldn’t be overlooked. The building is low-rise and it is located off Pattaya 3rd Road, close to Central Pattaya Road. From here it is possible to walk to Big C Extra, Soi Buakow and with public transport be spoilt with a choice of high street shopping malls, and entertainment venues like Walking street and North Pattaya. The property is positioned on the 4th floor of the building, and the owner has always maintained and made improvements to the condo when needed. It is a corner unit of 78 sq.m. The living area is very usable and the design offers a wrap around balcony with 180° views of the city. There is a washing machine, work surface and a BBQ area out here on the balcony. Inside the well lit apartment, there is a modern European kitchen, full furniture and full air conditioning. The bedroom also has access to the balcony and built in wardrobes. The communal features of the condo include: a communal pool and garden, fitness center, underground parking, on-site maintenance and maids team and even a club-style lounge-bar on the ground floor. This property is owned in Foreign Name Ownership, with all tax and transfer fees split 50/50 between seller and buyer

Laguna Bay 2 is located in the Pratumnak area which has always been very popular with expats. On the hill between Pattaya and Jomtien it benefits from both plus it also has its own community of quieter bars and restaurants. The beach is less crowded here and there are relaxing walks along the promenade to be had. Access into town is easy in a car/motorbike, and there are plenty of taxis and Songtows in the area. Laguna Bay 2 has a communal pool, sauna and gym. This unit is 37m² and located on the 5th floor overlooking the pool with some sea views. The property is fully furnished including a European style kitchen. There is even space for a dining area, or enjoy your food on the balcony. Available for long term rental with a 2 month security deposit. Call Cornerstone Real Estate on +66 384 11250 or Email info@old.cornerstone.co.th for further details or to make an appointment.

City Garden Pratumnak. Located on the top of Cozy Beach this 8 storey condominium comprises of 2 buildings which run either side of the central communal swimming pool. Below each building is underground car parking, and there is a reception desk and fitness center on the ground floor of one of the buildings. Cozy Beach is a quiet hillside between Pattaya and Jomtien with a great beach and small high street. There is always regular access to public transport to get into Pattaya and Jomtien. From the building it is just a short walk to choice of restaurants, shops and services and within easy walking distance to the popular Cosy Beach. This 5th floor unit comes fully furnished, and has a Euro kitchen, air conditioning throughout, and full height windows and balcony sliding doors.It is available to buy in Foreign Name (freehold) ownership with any property taxes and transfer fees split on a 50/50 basis.

Laguna Beach Resort "Maldives" is the 3rd condominium to carry the "Laguna Beach" brand name. This is the developers largest to date with an incredible central lagoon swimming pool which has many secluded outdoor spaces within a tropical landscape besides the masses of water. The gymnasium also looks directly out across the swimming pool. Located close to Jomtien Beach, this low rise (8 storey) resort provides easy access to all of the shops, restaurants and attractions along Jomtien Beach road, and Jomtien 2nd road. It is possible to find everything you need for day-to-day living, and it is a more slow paced and laid back environment than the bustle of Pattaya City. This 3rd floor studio has great swimming pool views from its balcony. Inside, the whole unit has modern fitted and built in furniture, plus a Euro kitchenette, Air Conditioning and rain shower bathroom. The unit is offered for rent with a minimum 6 month rental contract, plus the property is for sale in Thai Name Ownership. The taxes and transfer fees to change name shall be split equally 50/50 Call us on +6638411250 or Email info@old.cornerstone.co.th

City Garden Pratumnak. This modern low-rise condominium was completed in 2016 and stands on the top of Cozy Beach - Pratumnak Hill. There are 2 residential buildings which run either side of the central communal swimming pool. Below each building is underground car parking, and there is a reception desk and fitness center on the ground floor of one of the buildings. City Garden Pratumnak is a quiet beach area between Pattaya and Jomtien. It is just a short walk to choice of restaurants, shops and services and within easy walking distance to the popular Cosy Beach. There is easy access to public transportation for trips to Pattaya and Jomtien. This 5th floor unit comes fully furnished, and has a Euro kitchen, air conditioning throughout, and full height windows and balcony sliding doors. It is available to buy in Foreign Name (freehold) ownership with any property taxes and transfer fees split on a 50/50 basis. It is available for rent on a long term 12 month basis with a 2 month security deposit. Call us on 038411250 or email info@old.cornerstone.co.th to make an appointment

The Avenue Condo is a well-known condominium complex in the heart of the city. It’s nestled between Soi Buakhao and 2nd Road, approx. 400 metres from the beach. The Avenue shopping mall is close by with the cinema on the top floor. Everything is on your doorstep here with restaurants, bars, coffee shops and all manner of shops within walking distance. Central Plaza is less than a kilometer away by foot or the regular Songtows that frequent 2nd Road. The complex has underground parking, gym, sauna and swimming pool. There is a range of studio, one and 2 bed apartments available. This apartment is 44m² and has a separate bedroom. On the 7th floor it has city views from the balcony. The property comes fully furnished including a European kitchen and a great shower room. Call Cornerstone Real Estate on +66 384 11250 or Email info@old.cornerstone.co.th for further details, or to make an appointment.

Pong is the upper part of Mabprachan Lake, close to the connection routes with the Bangkok - Pattaya Motorway and Highway 36 which connects all major industrial hubs around the area. From here there are also 3 International Schools within 20 minutes, plus 4 golf courses right on the doorstep! This cleared and leveled land plot is 151 Wah² which is equal to 604 Sq.m Priced at 13,245 Baht per square wah Owned in Thai Name with all taxes and transfer fees split 50/50 between buyer and seller Call us on +6638411250 or Email info@old.cornerstone.co.th for more details or to arrange a viewing

The Axis Condo. This high rise tower sits right at the top of Pratumnak Hill. This gives almost all of the units good views over the hillside, and many with sea views of Pattaya City, Jomtien or Pratumnak beaches. This 8th floor unit has been furnished to a high taste and does have some excellent views over the recreation parks and Buddha Hill. In total the property is 38sq.m and comes complete with fitted kitchen, built in washing machine, built in wardrobes and wall mounted slimline LED TV. The Axis has an amazing sea & city view infinity swimming pool, a large air conditioned gymnasium and multi storey car park. It is available for rent on a long term 12 month basis with a 2 month security deposit. Call us on 038411250 or email info@old.cornerstone.co.th to make an appointment

Na Lanna is located just off Sukhumvit and Pattaya Neua (North Road) in a quiet street. There are plenty of shops, restaurants and bars near at hand and Songtows are close at hand. The main Pattaya bus station is just 500m away which will get you anywhere you need to go. Na Lanna has a gym and a swimming pool. This apartment is almost 30m² and on the 2nd floor. There is a separate bedroom and the sofa folds down for any short term guests that come along. There is a Euro-style kitchen area and a balcony overlooking the pool. Call Cornerstone Real Estate on +66 384 11250 or Email info@old.cornerstone.co.th for further details or to make an appointment.
Description coming soon

The Cliff Condominium. Located on the Cosy Beach area of Pratumnak Hill, which is a headland between Jomtien Beach and Pattaya City. Public transport accesses this area frequently so it is easy to get about, and the shops outside make this a convenient place to live. This 24th floor one bedroom condo has Northern views over the hilltop towards the city, which gives impressive views day, or night. The property is fully furnished and ready to move in. It is available for rent on a long term 12 month basis with a 2 month security deposit. Call us on 038411250 or email info@old.cornerstone.co.th to make an appointment

The Cliff condominium. This large one bedroom unit comes fully equipped with a large fitted Euro kitchen, spacious separate living room and bedroom and a bathroom with bath tub. Throughout the unit are good quality built-in and loose furnishings and air conditioning. The Cliff condominium provides all residents access to use the huge communal swimming pool, children’s water slides and a poolside gymnasium. There is also a children's playground, underground parking and on-site reception, security and maintenance staff. Located on Pratumnak Hill, this area has its own small high street that has plenty to offer. There is a choice of massage and spa’s, souvenir shops, convenience stores and some market stalls, and a good selection of restaurants & bars to unwind at the end of the day. Pratumnak Hill is just a few minutes drive from Downtown Pattaya and is a much more quiet and relaxed part of the city. Available to rent with a 12 month contact and a 2 month security deposit. Contact Cornerstone Real Estate via Email: info@old.cornerstone.co.th or call the office on +6638411250 for further details, or to make an appointment

This single storey villa is located in a very popular area of East Pattaya, very close to the Mabprachan lake. This place offers easy access onto the highways and motorways which feed all of the Ex Pat Eastern Seaboard industry areas, plus a whole host of International schools, and golf courses! This area really has become 'the' Ex Pat area for families. With plenty of child, and family activities ranging from horse riding, sports and leisure, cycle tracks, ATV's, football pitches and much much more Set in a small enclave of private houses, this 3 bedroom villa really does offer something wonderful. Upon entering through the electric gates you are greeted by a massive private swimming pool and poolside covered terrace. This is perfect for the tropical climate and must be a delight to own and enjoy. Inside the home the living room extends onto this spacious terrace from 2 sides. This living space has an open plan Euro kitchen next to a separate pantry, guest bathroom, dining area and TV/living area. The master bedroom and guest bedrooms all have patio doors that lead out to the garden and pool area as well. Each bedroom has private en-suite bathrooms and the whole house comes fully furnished. Other additions are the outdoor kitchen, laundry area, covered carport and even an outdoor sauna. Please call us to arrange a viewing of this fantastic property. +6638411250 or Email info@old.cornerstone.co.th

The Cliff Condominium is located on Cozy Beach, Pratumnak Hill. This area is just a few minutes drive from Downtown Pattaya and is a much more quiet and relaxed part of the city. Boasting its own small high street that has plenty to offer. By day you can enjoy a choice of massage and spa's, and in the evening there are a good selection of restaurants & bars to unwind. Cozy Beach is a gorgeous small sandy bay, with clean waters and views across to Koh Larn Island. This 10th floor studio apartment is very spacious and a well laid out use of space. The property comes fully equipped with a Euro kitchen, fitted bathroom and full furniture, plus from this 10th floor balcony you can see down to the swimming pool below. As well as the communal swimming pool there are children's water slides and a poolside gymnasium. The condo is available to rent with a minimum 6 month contract and a 2 month security deposit

The Cliff Condominium. This is a 27 floor high rise tower located in the Cozy Beach area of Pratumnak Hill. The building offers some amazing communal facilities for all of its residents which include a huge swimming pool with a children area and water slides, as well as a poolside gymnasium. Along all sides of the pool is sufficient sunbed areas as well. Also in the list of features you will see a children's playground, underground car-parking, 24 hour security and an onsite reception & maintenance team. Set on the 3rd floor of the building, this 37 Sq.m studio unit has been well decorated and furnished throughout. There is a nice fitted Western kitchen with upper and lower storage, a full height built in wardrobe and a marble bathroom. Call Cornerstone Real Estate on +6638411250 or Email info@old.cornerstone.co.th for further details, or to make an appointment

Ananya Beachfront Condo is found directly on a stunning beachfront position along Wongamat Beach. This is Pattaya's Northern beach and it has some of the beast views around. There is an outlook right out to sea, with the smaller Koh Larn island on the horizon, plus the crescent bay rolls back to Pattaya City so you can see the whole skyline clearly. The building offers direct beach access, and an 80 metre infinity pool which runs between the beach and the 2 buildings. This 42 Sq.m studio is located on the 2nd floor and is a corner unit. This mean that it gets additional windows which help brighten the property and make it feel more spacious. The white high gloss fitted furniture and Western kitchen also look amazing. Any buyer will appreciate that the property is sold fully furnished as each item is good quality and compliments the room well. The title deed is held in Foreign Name ownership, and all taxes & transfer fees will be split 50/50 between buyer and seller Send us an Email or contact the office for more details, or to arrange a viewing Tel: +6638411250 Email: info@cornerstone.co.th

Centara Avenue Residence is a low-rise condominium set just of Pattaya 2nd Road in the centre of the city. It is possible to walk to every location from here. 3 shopping malls are right on the doorstep, and there is a busy road that has tons of bars & restaurants around a 2 minute walk away. Of course, Pattaya beach is also 400 metres from here. The condominium has a huge central lagoon swimming pool with a sunken bar, and children's water slides. Part of this project includes Centara azure Hotel which has an on-site restaurant which all residents can enjoy too. This studio unit is located on the 8th floor of the building and is 35 sq.m in total size. Available for rent long term with a 2 month security deposit Call us +6638411250 or Email info@cornerstone.co.th for more details and to arrange a viewing

This ultra modern 4 bedroom house, boasts a huge living area of around 450 sqm and house sits on 800 sqm of land, large private pool and car port area and set in a very quiet part of Bang Saray, the beach being less than 5 minutes away. The house has a self contained guest suite, that is finished in stunning brushed wall effect and outside shower. The comes fully furnished to a high standard and is owned in Thai name, which can easily be transferred into a company if required. Please contact the team at Cornerstone Real Estate for more information on this premium property.

Hin Wong Nivate is a beachfront village along the Southern coastline of Na Jomtien. This stretch of beach is beautiful, with amazing skyline views back towards the city. The surrounding area is quiet and peaceful and there is a beachfront communal swimming pool available for all residents. Na Jomtien has some of the best beachfront restaurants in the whole of the city, plus you can get into Pattaya City within 20-25 minutes. Call Cornerstone Real Estate on +6638411250 or Email info@cornerstone.co.th for more details

titles.title: 180 Sq.wah development land plot in Naklua

descriptions.description: This land plot is positioned on a know road that connects Naklua high street to the beaches of Wongamat. 180 Sq.wah is equal to 720 sq.metres The plot is owned in Thai Name and all taxes and transfer fees will be split equally on a 50/50 basis between seller & buyer Call us on +6638411250 or Email info@cornerstone.co.th to arrange a viewing
